descriptionHtml:
Hodor recommends you get this mod on Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=156211011
______________________________________________________________ 
Features: 
- Faendal, a Bosmer follower found in Riverwood, sings a beautiful song about Hodor. 
- Asking Heimskr in Whiterun about Talos converts him into a (fully voiced!) preacher of Hodor! 
- Hodor loading screens! 
- Hodor quest names and objectives! 
- Hodor! 
- Compatible with the Game Of Thrones Adaptation Mod and Better Whiterun! 
- Hodor! 
- All shrines now give the Blessing of Hodor! 
- Servants of Hodor!
____________________________________________________________________ 
Coming Soon: 
- Hodor followers! 
- Hodor background music! 
- Hodor shouts! 
________________________________________________________________ 
Known Bugs: 

- When the bard in The Bannered Mare is asked to play Ragnar The Red, his voice is briefly replaced with Hodor\'s.
author: srw345
